speaker: Doctor
text: Hi, how have you been doing with your lamotrigine lately?

speaker: Patient
text: Hi, I've been doing well. No seizures and the side effects have been manageable.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's great to hear. Are you experiencing any side effects that we should discuss?

speaker: Patient
text: Just some occasional dizziness, but it's not too bad. It usually happens if I miss a meal.

speaker: Doctor
text: Okay, it's important to take it with food if that's helping. Have you had any issues with remembering to take your doses?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, I set reminders on my phone, so that keeps me on track.
